movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movies.description: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Dune: Part Two
movies.description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen people of the desert planet Arrakis to wage war against the galactic empire that destroyed his family.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer programmer discovers that lives a double life as a hacker discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation and joins a rebellion against the machines.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: A ten-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

movies.title: Seven
movies.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max joins forces with Furiosa to flee from a tyrant and his army in an explosive high-speed chase for freedom.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

movies.title: There Will Be Blood
movies.description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the oil business.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movies.title: Oldboy
movies.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years without explanation, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find he must find his captor in five days.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A writer recounts the adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Thing
movies.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.
Two young British soldiers during World War I are given an impossible mission: deliver a message deep in enemy territory that will stop 1,600 men from walking into a deadly trap.
